title: Only I Know that the School’s Prince Heroine has a Secret Side that she Doesn’t Show to Anyone - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Average-looking Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Childhood Friends   Heartwarming   Male Protagonist   Popular Love Interests
author: Akagane Musashi   赤金武蔵
description:
When you're standing, you're a princess, when you're sitting, you're a priceless jewel, and when you're walking, you're a prince. Tsukimiya Suzuno, the School's Prince, is a second-year, class 1 Rinrei Academy student.

Lovely, lovely, lovely, lovely, lovely, lovely, lovely, lovely, lovely, lovely, lovely, lovely, lovely Despite this, she treats everyone equally and lavishes them with loving words.

“Hello, little kitten,” says the narrator.

“Good morning, and you're still looking cute.”

“Did you shave your head? You have a manly appearance; it fits you.”

And such a girl has a hidden side that she keeps hidden from others—

“Gimme a hug, Shougo!”

“I want to eat sweets, Shougo.”

“My favorite dish is Shougo's!”

“Shougo.”

“Shougo~”

—Yes, she behaves like a spoiled child in front of Hinata Shougo.

This is the initial page of the youtuber's website.>
